overview: Kim and David have two kids and a nice home in the suburbs, but their marriage has become rocky. After a heated argument they tell each other, I wish for just one day you could see things from my point of view. With that they switch bodies and are forced to live in each others lives. Funny, entertaining and above all SEXY, Switch is guaranteed to turn you on!
tagline: The man of the house isn't himself lately.
title: Switch
